name: Vector Databases
description: Specialized databases designed to store and query high-dimensional vector embeddings for semantic search.
marketRelevance: Critical for RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architectures. High demand in GenAI startups.

name: RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)
description: Technique to enhance LLM responses by retrieving relevant data from outside the foundation model.
marketRelevance: The industry standard for building enterprise AI apps that require domain-specific knowledge.

name: LangChain
description: Framework for developing applications powered by language models, enabling chaining of calls.
marketRelevance: The most widely adopted orchestration framework for LLMs. Essential for building agents.

name: React.js
description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components.
marketRelevance: Remains the dominant frontend library. Required for 80% of frontend roles.

name: FastAPI
description: Modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+.
marketRelevance: The go-to framework for serving AI models due to its speed and native async support.

name: Next.js
description: The React Framework for the Web. Enables server-side rendering and static site generation.
marketRelevance: Standard for production-grade React applications favoring SEO and performance.

name: TypeScript
description: Typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
marketRelevance: Non-negotiable for large-scale codebases. Replaced JS in most enterprise stacks.

name: Docker & Containerization
description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.
marketRelevance: Essential for deployment. 'It works on my machine' is no longer an acceptable excuse.
